short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display A full page quick preview of any link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Previewer is a Chrome extension that allows you to preview the contents of a linked page without leaving the current page. When you press shift button and hover over a link, a full page modal appears displaying a preview of the linked page in an iframe. The preview shows the full page, so you can get a good idea of what the page looks like without having to click through to it.
How it works: 
Press Shift button and than hover on any link ( that's it )
